author: pquerna
msg: Improve returned errors from kevent/kqueue by using apr_get_netos_error() rather than just returning a hard coded error.

author: pquerna
msg: This was mostly sitting in the pollcb-dev branch for several months at:
This commit has small improvements over the branch, and also includes a KQueue backend.

This will likely break trunk for operating systems were we only have select|poll, so we will need to add some autoconf foo to define a HAVE_APR_POLLCB unless someone can implement apr_pollcb for all platforms.

author: taylor
msg: portlet tracking to remove non-responsive portlets from service
